entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
